translation: When the perfectly controlled mind rests in the Self alone, free from longing for any of the objects of desire, then it is said, 'He is united'.
commentary: 6.18 When when? humble perfectly controlled? Chittam mind? Atmani in the Self? Eve only? Does it stand rests? desireless free from longing? from all (objects of) desires? right united? It is thus? is said is said? Then then.Commentary Perfectly controlled mind The mind with onepointedness.When all desires for the objects of pleasure seen or unseen die? the mind becomes very peaceful and rests
